articles.description: All the latest football news and Premier League reaction as Nottingham Forest beat Crystal Palace and build-up to the Champions League.

articles.description: England recall Rehan Ahmed as one of three frontline spinners for the series decider against Pakistan in Rawalpindi.

articles.description: The scaled-down games will feature 10 sports across four venues between 23 July and 2 August 2026.
articles.title: Sports announced for Glasgow 2026 Commonwealth Games

articles.title: F1 Q&A: Lando Norris and Max Verstappen US Grand Prix battle, Lewis Hamilton and Ferrari

articles.description: Barcelona's league fixture against Atletico Madrid in December could be staged in Miami - with La Liga officials hopeful that Fifa will approve the plan.
articles.title: Barcelona v Atletico Madrid could be first La Liga match held in United States

articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 contender Sophia Smith

articles.title: Girona FC: what is the future for last season's fairytale club?

articles.description: Brazilian clubs have dominated the Copa Libertadores for five years, but Argentina's River Plate and Uruguay's Penarol are aiming to end that.
articles.title: Copa Libertadores: River Plate and Penarol out to end Brazilian dominance

articles.description: England will play USA in the opening match of the Women's 2025 Rugby World Cup at Sunderland's Stadium of Light on 22 August.
articles.title: Women's Rugby World Cup 2025: Hosts England to face USA in opener
